name: uzdu
description: UZDU - universal zipper, downloader and uploader. Move files to/from zip, clouds (AWS, Azure), to HTTP PUT (e.g. Nexus) and to SSH

scripts.test:azure: npm run test:metadata && tsx src/cli.ts upload azure -d --azure -- test/web
scripts.test:http:upload: tsx src/cli.ts upload http --dotenv --header "Authorization: Basic TOKEN=" website.zip https://nexus/repository/private-raw/dist/test-upload/website.zip
scripts.test:http:download: tsx src/cli.ts download http --dotenv --header "Authorization: Basic TOKEN=" https://nexus/repository/private-raw/dist/test-upload/website.zip website.zip
scripts.test:exec: tsx src/cli.ts exec ssh -d -- sftp://root@m.itranga.com/~ 'echo "Hello world!"; pwd'
scripts.test:dist: npm run test:zip && npm run test:http:upload
